name: Elixir of Dubious Augmentation
I0D: When you drink this potion, you experience a strange feeling of inversion. For the next 24 hours, the values of your lowest ability score and your highest ability score are swapped, ties determined by the Dungeon Master.
I1D:
This potion bottle is clear with both a black and blue liquid inside.
Neither mixture will mix with the other, so both sit swirling and separating within the bottle. When you open the bottle, you notice for a brief moment a strong scent, which quickly changes to something on the polar opposite of the spectrum.
